name: A Must at Coonawarra

reviews.text: Surrounded by the stunning world famous Coonawarra vineyards, must @ Coonawarra is just a stroll or short drive from over 24 cellar doors, offering travellers the ideal base for enjoying the other RED CENTRE.
reviews.title: died and went to motel heaven

reviews.text: Apartments and studios are fully self-contained with quality appliances and homewares. must @ Coonawarra promises commitment to quality and customer service. Your hosts are knowledgeable of the area and have put a lot into their small piece of paradise.
reviews.title: must stay @ must

likes.liked: — Modern, spotlessly clean, close to wineries and sights

description: Award winning luxury accommodation in the world famous Coonawarra wine region, and just walking distance to the cafe's,galleries and shops of Penola. Self-contained luxury apartments with free WiFi and DVD library,off street parking, native gardens and guest BBQ area. Well located to explore the Limestone coast and the world heritage caves.
